div.p: The minimum O 2/CO ratio suggested by the observed iron oxidation in 2.7 Ga micrometeorites ( Tomkins et al., 2016 ), as a function of the melting temperature T [K]. Shaded regions show where there is sufficient O 2 (light blue), sufficient temperature (light orange), and the overlap between these two regions (dark orange). The dotted line is the O 2/CO ratio in the upper atmosphere for an anoxic atmosphere with a 1 bar surface pressure, and the dashed line is the O 2/CO ratio in the upper atmosphere for an anoxic atmosphere with a 0.3 bar surface pressure.
